entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 8:22 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
